label: otherChargeAmount
comment: A monetary value added or subtracted from the total invoice price not previously taken into account for this cross-border customs valuation.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A cross-border trade related assessment of the worth of an object, such as its monetary value, for customs purposes.
